title: Earth Chronicle
description: (test-user: test@test.com pw: 1234567) Event Tracker & Management Single Page Web App Platform that can add any kind of events that took place on earth in a list. We can also edit delete and view those events with the sign in and sign up facility.

title: Redux Cart
description: A simple cart functionality implemented using firestore react and redux-toolkit

title: Chatbot Flow Builder
description: This is simple Chatbot flow builder app, built using React Flow library and was given to me as a hiring Frontend task by BiteSpeed. A chatbot flow is built by connecting multiple messages together to decide the order of execution.
